title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: The new class wizard in Build 20011106 does not correctly determine the context for nested classes.
EB: When a .java file is open in the editor, and the new class button is clicked, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank. It should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
1. Open a .java file in the editor.
2. Click the new class button.
3. Check if the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank.
